events.name: Book Club: High Performance Browser Networking
events.description:
We're going to be working through this highly-regarded book by Google engineer, Ilya Grigorik: High Performance Browser Networking: What Every Web Developer Should Know about Networking and Web Performance  


This week we'll be covering the last chapter 18: WebRTC Please read the chapter before you come to the meetup! Book club is held at Tim & Wei's residence: 244A Tanjong Katong RdSingapore  437032Singapore Doors open at 6:30, meetup starts at 7. Feel free to ask questions in the SingaporeJS gitter room: https://gitter.im/SingaporeJS/discussions
events.location: Tim & Wei's Residence, 244A Tanjong Katong Road, Singapore

events.name: An evening on Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and After Effects
events.description:
Motion Graphics with Illustrator and After Effects
by Lynus Hee
Adobe Certified Instructor Lynus Hee will demostrate how to convert and re-purpose your existing graphic designs or even stock designs into motion design.
 
Build Animated GIFs in Photoshop Animated
by Mark Plunkett
 
GIF format has been around for many years and you may have seen them in many websites and social media. In this session, we will like to show you how simple it is to create an animated GIF using Photoshop. After this session, you can create fun and interactive banners, icons, logos and images.

Register Here
https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/creative-crew-talks-sep-meeting-2015-tickets-18362390404

events.name: Meteor September Meetup
events.description: Hello everyone, It's time for our September MeteorSG meetup! This is kind of a placeholder for now as some people are starting to ask when the next meetup is :-) *** Call for speakers! Message us on our facebook page (link below) or comment below if you have anything interesting to present! ***  Doors open from 7pm and we will start the talks promptly at 7.30pm.  ==================================== Meetup Agenda: #1 - Ramda.js: another underscore? - Maxim Filimonov Maxim will talk about this functional javascript library. Details: http://ramdajs.com/0.17/index.html #2 - Quick & Dirty Infinite Scroll - Duncan Foster Duncan will explain how to quickly add infinite scrolling functionality to your Meteor application. #3 - Practical Walkthrough - Creating a Mobile app with Meteor, React and Ionic - Rick Behl We will follow this tutorial: https://medium.com/@SamCorcos/meteor-react-ionic-mobile-app-part-1-the-basic-template-9355ebf3397f Please bring your own laptop if you wish to follow along. #4 - Meteor Clinic: - If anyone has any specific Meteor questions or problems they can ask the community here to see if someone can help. So please make a note of any questions/problems you have! Remember - there is no such thing as a 'stupid question' (</a>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/No_such_thing_as_a_stupid_question) #5 Save the date! - Meteor Global Hackathon on 10-11th October 2015 More details here: <a href="http://info.meteor.com/2015-hackathon">http://info.meteor.com/2015-hackathon #6 Housekeeping - Reminder that we have the following communication channels: Facebook: </a>https://www.facebook.com/groups/meteorjssg Slack: <a href="https://meteorsg.slack.com/">https://meteorsg.slack.com Website & Blog: <a href="http://singapore.meteor.com/"></a>http://singapore.meteor.com/ #7 Socializing / Networking  ==================================== We do also try to allocate some time for anyone to share about any Meteor projects they are working on or would like to talk about. We should have a projector at the venue so please just bring a laptop if you would like to do this. Some talks may be interactive so if you wish to follow along then please bring along a laptop (preferably with Meteor and MongoDB pre-installed). Location: Please note this is a new location for us. Thanks to Duncan for helping to organize. We should have food/beverages provided by the venue ;-) Organizers: Rick Behl, Old school programmer, hacker and entrepreneur Duncan Foster Venue sponsor: Netsuite
events.location: Netsuite, 9 Battery Road, #08-01, Straits Trading Building, Singapore
